item.description:
Join us for another dim sum outing and arts festival. The Boston "ahts" Festival is held at Christopher Columbus park which is right next to the Marriot Long Wharf and across from Fanueil Hall. After dim sum we will walk over to the festival. It's only about a 20 minute walk, burn off some of those calories.

This RSVP will be for dim sum, so we can get an accurate head count and put in a reservations for tables. If you plan to go to the arts festival you can also note that in your RSVP.

See link for more info on the arts festival.

http://www.bostonahts...

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dim Sum & Arts Festival
